data.comment: The match is underway in Blackburn.
Amari Bell is replacing Barry Douglas for the home team.
In the minute 43, Goal! Adam Armstrong gives Blackburn a 1-0 lead.
The second-half is underway in Blackburn.
In the minute 58, Barnsley make their first substitution with Dominik Frieser replacing Conor Chaplin.
The away team have replaced Luke Thomas with Victor Adeboyejo. This is the second substitution made today by Valerien Ismael.
Tony Mowbray is making the team's second substitution at Ewood Park with Bradley Johnson replacing Tom Trybull.
In the minute 66, Tony Mowbray (Blackburn) is making a third substitution, with Sam Gallagher replacing Harvey Elliott.
Clarke Oduor is on a sub for Alex Mowatt for Barnsley.
Adam Armstrong (Blackburn) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 76, The home team replace Scott Wharton with Hayden Carter.
Goal! Blackburn extend their lead to 2-0 through Sam Gallagher.
George Miller is replacing Cauley Woodrow for Barnsley at Ewood Park.
In the minute 81, The away team have replaced Callum Styles with Romal Palmer. This is the fifth substitution made today by Valerien Ismael.
Romal Palmer puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 2-1.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-1.
